description.value:
You unleash your ki as a powerful storm of force and lightning, dealing [[/r {2d6}[force]]]{2d6 force damage} and [[/r {2d12}[electricity]]]{2d12 electricity damage} to creatures in the area. If you use 2 actions to cast the spell, increase the size of the emanation to 10 feet and the damage to [[/r {3d6}[force]]]{3d6 force damage} and [[/r {3d12}[electricity]]]{3d12 electricity damage}. If you use 3 actions to cast the spell, increase the size of the emanation to 20 feet and the damage to [[/r {4d6}[force]]]{4d6 force damage} and [[/r {4d12}[electricity]]]{4d12 electricity damage}. Each creature attempts one basic Reflex save that applies to both types of damage On a failed save, the creature is @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Deafened]{Deafened} for 1 round; on a critical failure, the creature also takes [[/r {2d12}[persistent,electricity]]] @Compendium[pf2e.conditionitems.Persistent Damage]{Persistent Electricity Damage} and is deafened for 1 minute.

Heightened (+2) The force damage increases by [[/r 1d6]] and the electricity damage by [[/r 1d12]], or [[/r 2d6]] and [[/r 2d12]] if you use 2 or 3 actions
